class.name: TrainSecuritySystem
class.brief_description: Class used to handle all security systems like CA/SHP and SIFA
class.description: Class that handles trains security systems

method.name: security_acknowledge
method.description: Enable or disable security acknowledge signal. Leaving this option on for a longer period of time will first trigger the alarm and then the emergency brakes will be activated after a while.

members.member: [code]Security:AwareDelay[/code] Delay between activation of the aware system, in seconds
[code]Security:AwareSystem=CabSignal[/code] Is the CabSignal aware system available
[code]Security:AwareSystem=SeparateAcknowledge[/code] Is the SeparateAcknowledge aware system available
[code]Security:AwareSystem=SIFA[/code] Is the SIFA aware system available
[code]Security:MaxHoldTime[/code] The duration of holding down the CA [b]dead man's[/b] button, after which warning lights are turned on.
[code]Security:EmergencyBrakeDelay[/code] Time from sound signal activation to emergency brake activation in seconds.
[code]Security:EmergencyBrakeWarningSignal[/code] Definition of optional, automatic activation of the vehicle siren during emergency braking implementation
[code]Security:RadioStop[/code] Definition of the operation of the Radio-Stop signal.
[code]Security:MagnetLocation[/code] Distance of the SHP sensor from the vehicle's front in meters. By default, half of the vehicle's length.
[code]Security:SoundSignalDelay[/code] Time to activate the sound signal in seconds.

signal.name: beeping_changed
signal.description: Train security system started or stopped beeping

signal.name: blinking_changed
signal.description: Train security system started or stopped blinking
